General.Name: Public joint-stock company Asko-Strakhovanie
General.Description: Public joint-stock company Asko-Strakhovanie provides various insurance products and services in Russia. The company offers car, health, business, house, mortgage and accident insurance products, as well as risk management services. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Chelyabinsk, Russia.
